definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
International Court of Justice in The Hague

sentences.english: The wills of states are the foundation for EIL.
sentences.chinese: 國家意志是國際法強制執行的根據。

sentences.english: In doing so, the US has violated international law and encroached upon China's sovereignty and territorial airspace.
sentences.chinese: 美機此舉違反了國際法，侵犯了中國主權和領空。

sentences.english: You can take Uncle Sam before a world court.
sentences.chinese: 在國際法庭之前，你能夠抓到山姆大叔。

sentences.english: The international community should give ICJ more opportunity to display its justice.
sentences.chinese: 國際社會應該給予國際法院更多表現其公正的機會。

sentences.english: Do British laws conflict with any international laws?
sentences.chinese: 英國法與國際法是否有相違背之處？

sentences.english: Chapter Four discusses China's attitude towards the optional compulsory jurisdiction of ICJ.
sentences.chinese: 第四章考察了中國與國際法院任意強制管轄權。

sentences.english: The harmonization theory sees international law and muncipal law as concordant bodies of doctrine .
sentences.chinese: 協調說認爲國際法和國內法是和諧一致的學說體系。

sentences.english: True security will come through adherence to international law and the demonstration of its peaceful intent.
sentences.chinese: 真正的安全將來自於堅持國際法和表明其和平意圖。

sentences.english: There are sufficient legal bases for the enforcement of international law (EIL).
sentences.chinese: 國際法的強制執行具有充分的法理基礎。

sentences.english: And international law constrains strong nations more than it does the weak.
sentences.chinese: 因而，國際法對強國的限制要大於弱國。

sentences.english: Our law prohibits torture, as well as international law.
sentences.chinese: 我們的法律禁止虐囚，國際法也是如此。

sentences.english: Vishnu Swaroop KyanamWhat are UN and International Court Doing?
sentences.chinese: 聯合國和國際法庭在幹什麼？

sentences.english: Jus cogens are the norm basis of EIL.
sentences.chinese: 強行法是國際法強制執行的規範基礎。

sentences.english: Cover Title Papers collection of the International Law School Deans ' Conference on Legal Education for the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 21世紀法學敎育曁國際法學院校長硏討會論文集。

sentences.english: China's establishment of the Air Defense Identification Zone in the East China Sea is consistent with international law and international practice.
sentences.chinese: 中國劃設東海防空識別區符合國際法和國際慣例。

sentences.english: Addition's Internation's Standards may be added to the series in the future.
sentences.chinese: 異日還能夠對本系列法式增加若干項國際法式。
